Eureka Link: Save Tabs & Export to Markdown.

Effortlessly save important tabs into a temporary stack and export them as ready-to-use Markdown links. Capture your "Eureka!" moments and streamline your workflow.

Features
- Effortless Tab Saving: Instantly capture essential tabs during your research sessions.
- Local Stack:  Your saved tabs are stored locally within your browser, ensuring your research data remains private.
- Markdown Export: Seamlessly transfer your research links into your preferred markdown-based note-taking apps.
- Temporary Workspace: Ideal for short-term projects and focused research dives.

Use Cases
- Programmers: Effortlessly track solutions discovered while troubleshooting code. Reference saved links when creating pull requests or updating READMEs.
- Researchers: Dive deep into any subject, curating the most valuable resources you find along the way.
- Note-takers: Enhance your note-taking workflow by directly integrating web research.
- Content Creators: Keep track of your inspirational sources neatly organized.


Usage
1. Discover: Experience a "Eureka!" moment and save that essential tab with a click of the Eureka Link icon.
2. Curate: Build a focused stack of your most valuable finds.
3. Export: Click "Copy to Clipboard" to get your links in clean Markdown format, ready to paste into your notes.
